Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 97 of 261 1258
LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross
1 (In open court)
2 BY MS. STERNHEIM:
3 Q. Kate, did there come a time that you divorced your husband, the restauranteur?
4 A. He divorced me.
5 Q. And how long were you married at that point?
6 A. I think it was just under a year.
7 Q. And prior to marrying him, had you been engaged to other people?
8 A. Yes.
9 MS. POMERANTZ: Objection.
10 THE COURT: I'll allow it.
11 Q. Did you ever marry again?
12 A. No.
13 Q. But you dated other people throughout the years; correct?
14 A. Yes.
15 Q. And you also have a child; correct?
16 A. I do.
17 Q. With someone with whom --
18 MS. POMERANTZ: Objection, your Honor.
19 THE COURT: Overruled.
20 MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, may we be heard at sidebar, please.
21 (Continued on next page)
22 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
23 DOJ-OGR-00012848

text_blocks.content:
(In open court)
BY MS. STERNHEIM:
Q. Kate, did there come a time that you divorced your husband, the restauranteur?
A. He divorced me.
Q. And how long were you married at that point?
A. I think it was just under a year.
Q. And prior to marrying him, had you been engaged to other people?
A. Yes.
MS. POMERANTZ: Objection.
THE COURT: I'll allow it.
Q. Did you ever marry again?
A. No.
Q. But you dated other people throughout the years; correct?
A. Yes.
Q. And you also have a child; correct?
A. I do.
Q. With someone with whom --
MS. POMERANTZ: Objection, your Honor.
THE COURT: Overruled.
MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, may we be heard at sidebar, please.
(Continued on next page)

additional_notes: The document is a court transcript with a clear and legible format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
